message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take half, fair is fair!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'll take the lion's share, you can get a small share!
Take it or leave it, Bob!
I'm being generous, take the crumbs!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or walk away!
I'll take it all, you can leave!
You win, I concede. Congratulations, Bob!
